channel.title: Erm
channel.description: Well, You know how when you right click a player it says like follow, attack, etc. I was wondering if i could add like something that says "duel" and you click it... it sends the other player a request to duel and if they accept you can duel them any where in the whole server. Would that be possible to make? o.0. If so how?

item.title: Erm
item.dc:creator: @bl00d_filthy bl00d filthy
item.description:
@bl00d_filthy wrote:

Well, You know how when you right click a player it says like follow, attack, etc. I was wondering if i could add like something that says “duel” and you click it… it sends the other player a request to duel and if they accept you can duel them any where in the whole server. Would that be possible to make? o.0. If so how?

Read full topic
